about_the_game:
Acolyte's are deep, perceptive assistants with a wealth of features and functionality buried under the surface of their programming.

The Acolyte Deluxe User Manual - created by Nanomax Technology - contains details for commands and features you might not have realised your Acolyte has, in addition to behind the scenes content and concepts.
detailed_description:
Acolyte's are deep, perceptive assistants with a wealth of features and functionality buried under the surface of their programming.

The Acolyte Deluxe User Manual - created by Nanomax Technology - contains details for commands and features you might not have realised your Acolyte has, in addition to behind the scenes content and concepts.
legal_notice: Acolyte © 2022. Developed by Superstring Ltd. Published by Superstring Ltd.
name: Acolyte Deluxe User Manual
